result.execSummary:
All charges against Archie L Oatis in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Archie L Oatis is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Archie L Oatis

records.addlTxt: Defendant Archie L Oatis appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Archie L Oatis.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. For reasons stated on the record Court orders case administratively closed.

Defendant Archie L Oatis not in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Archie L Oatis.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah M Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD PER COURT.
Case in court for Doctor's Report Return. Defendant was not produced by Zoom. Court orders case adjourned to allow defendant to appear by Zoom.
Case remains calendared in Branch 30.
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for November 4, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Proposed Order for Competency Examination by Department of Health Services

Defendant Archie L Oatis appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Archie L Oatis.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defense is contesting the report filed in this case and is requesting a reevaluation. Court orders a reevaluation of the defendant. Case is adjourned in Branch 30.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Archie L Oatis not in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court for Archie L Oatis.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Discussion held. There has been no hearing on the competency report received by this court. Defense requests the court to adopt the findings from Br. 38. Court declines. 
Defendant also has a felony matter in Branch 36 and will be seeking a global offer and request the court to authorize transfer.
Court authorizes transfer to Branch 36 for purposes of a global resolution, if accepted.
Case adjourned for a return on doctor's report.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Order Appointing Counsel, forwarded for signature.

Defendant Archie L Oatis not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Tom Harris appeared as a friend of the Court by video means.
Case in court for status conference.
Defendant has a felony matter (22CF2192) in Branch 36 and will be seeking a global offer and request the court to authorize transfer.
Court authorize transfer to Branch 36 for purposes of a global resolution, if accepted.   
The court appointed Attorney Tom Harris  to represent defendant at County expense at the rate of $100.00 per hour.
The Defendant is NOT required to reimburse Milwaukee County.
Court ordered matter adjourned for Status of Counsel.
Case remains calendared in Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Archie L Oatis not in court.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a status conference. Defendant has pending felony matter in which competency was raised. Counsel was contacted regarding the status of this case.
Case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Case rescheduled off the record due to judge unavailability.  Status conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Archie L Oatis not in court, defendant in custody.  Brandon Schwebler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a doctor's report return. Defendant does not yet have counsel.
Court ordered matter adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Archie L Oatis in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Archie L Oatis in custody.  Anthony J Moore appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into custody of Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 6-22-2022 @2:30p
